thread.title: TCU's Tuaua, Petties-Wilson return to practice following felony theft charges
thread.title_full: TCU's Tuaua, Petties-Wilson return to practice following felony theft charges | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: TCU's Tuaua, Petties-Wilson return to practice following felony theft charges
text:
Defensive end Mike Tuaua and wide receiver Andre Petties-Wilson, charged with felony theft last week, have returned to practice after having completed the school's in-house judicial process, coach Gary Patterson told reporters Wednesday.
Patterson did not indicate if either would play Saturday against Texas. The two were charged with hitting a TCU student and taking a case of beer from a party Sept. 4. Neither has played since the incident and a suspension was announced after their arrest.
Injured receiver Kolby Listenbee will probably be a late-week decision, Patterson indicated Tuesday.
-- Staff reports
